= Class *jplex.components.Calendar.Item*  =

== Description ==
Item representing one cell of the calendar (i.e. one day)<br />Store the corresponding HTML element and date and handle focus and select events.



== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `check()` || `void` || Check whether the date of the item match a valid date<br/>(regarding to the valid range set in the calendar configuration)<br /> ||
|| `focus()` || `void` || Set the focus on the item<br /> ||
|| `getCell()` || `Element` || Get the cell (td) element representing the item<br /> ||
|| `getDate()` || `Date` || Get the date of the item<br /> ||
|| `getIndex()` || `Integer` || Get the index of the item in the table<br /> ||
|| `select(eEvent, bIsClick)` || `void` || Selects the date corresponding to the item<br />  - `eEvent <Event>` - `bIsClick <boolean>` true if the selection results from a click on the cell||
